html: 6.11.17  11:11 pm   I can't ask a question because I don't have internet. Please help, I don't have a computer either. -Bogg
6.11.17  10:33 pm   Why do you shift a one or two letters in all headers of your website?
6.11.17  9:07 pm   How much time did it take you to put out the "history of the entire world, i guess" Video?

6.11.17  8:50 pm   You seem like a smart person that manages to mix inspiration, music, humor, and randomness in your works, and I love that. Like, it make me think "wow, when I grow up, I want to be him". So after this kinda lengthy introduction, here's my question: Why do you make your works so short? It kinda makes me sad, because it feels like you have so much potential, with all the music you make n' stuff, demonstrated in History of Japan and hotewig
6.11.17  7:23 pm   What's your general opinion on hip-hop/rap music?

6.10.17  11:33 pm   It seems odd to me that you are reluctant to post your songs to YouTube. From what you've said in the past, I thought one of your main motivations for creating content is the enjoyment from knowing lots of people are experiencing your content. Surely posting the songs on YouTube would increase that feeling.
